mapper.insert: insert into user_send_message ( id, phone, message_content, message_create_time, message_status, send_ip ) values ( #{id}, #{phone}, #{messageContent}, #{messageCreateTime}, #{messageStatus}, #{sendIp} )
mapper.select: select id as id, phone as phone, message_content as messageContent, message_create_time as messageCreateTime, message_status as messageStatus, send_ip as sendIp from user_send_message where id=#{id}

select id as id, phone as phone, message_content as messageContent, message_create_time as messageCreateTime, message_status as messageStatus, send_ip as sendIp from user_send_message where 1=1 and phone=#{messageAddress} order by message_create_time desc limit 1
